@menghaoranss  If we go ahead with this approach, we will risk someone calling getInstance() without ensuring init() was called and then returning an empty string as instanceId.
Moreover, this makes instanceId mutable i.e. anyone can do OrchestrationInstance.getInstance().init("a") and then OrchestrationInstance.getInstance().init("b")
